channel.title: Specs
channel.description: Right, I can make my whip spec attack players but how would i make it so it attacks npcs?

item.title: Specs
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

I dont know the voids you added… I told you to edit them! EX. Edit
resetBar()
To
VoidNameHere()

And the process
specOn

To

NAMEHERE

Thats all i can say for now

item.title: Specs
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

[quote=“Sir Jay, post:5, topic:96838”][quote author=Sir Jay link=topic=139511.msg1341057#msg1341057 date=1179598621]

Lol when i add under:

int EnemyX = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX; int EnemyY = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY; int EnemyX2 = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX; int EnemyY2 = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY; int casterX = absX; int casterY = absY; int offsetX = (casterX - EnemyX) * -1; int offsetY = (casterY - EnemyY) * -1; int EnemyHP = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].HP; int hitDiff = 0; int Npchitdiff = 0; int wepdelay = 0; CalculateMaxHit(); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);

I get client.java:24321: cannot find symbol symbol : variable specOn location: class client if(specOn) ^ client.java:24333: cannot find symbol symbol : method resetBar() location: class client resetBar(); ^ client.java:24336: cannot find symbol symbol : method resetBar() location: class client resetBar(); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 3 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

But i haven’t tried return false yet i will do now

[/quote][/quote]

Thats because you didnt edit the voids they are declaring …

item.title: Specs
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

Depends.

Add this under public boolean attacknpc () {

if(specOn)
{
if(specBar > 2)
{
	specBar -= 3;
	hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit * 2);
	stillgfx(341, server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY, server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX);
	setAnimation(1658); 
	server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitDiff = hitDiff;
	server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff;
	server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].updateRequired = true;
	server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitUpdateRequired = true;
	resetBar();
} else {
sendMessage("You need more special energy to do that");
resetBar();
}
}

Change specBar To what the void is called.

Read full topic
